growthexperiments-signupcampaign-title: Siyabonga ngokunikela! Manje joyina umphakathi wabahleli abenza iWikipedia ibe ngcono namuhla
growthexperiments-signupcampaign-body: Ukuhlela iWikipedia kungaba lula njengokwengeza isixhumanisi noma ukushintsha igama. Thola iziphakamiso zeziqephu zendatshana ku-{{GENDER:|yakho}} izihloko ozithakaselayo ngemva kokudala i-akhawunti yakho!
growthexperiments-campaigns-footer: Ngokudala i-akhawunti ye-{{GENDER:|yakho}} kuleli khasi, izohlotshaniswa nalo mkhankaso ukuze uthole ulwazi kanye nezinjongo zokuhlaziya.
